steps.name: : I am at the home page
: I click on the "Speakers" search filter
: I should be at the "Speakers" search page with "32 items"
: The title should be "Speakers" search page
: I select "SONY" as the brand
: I select "Â£40 - Â£80" as the price filter
: I should be at the "Speakers" search page with "3 items"
: I select the "SONY X11" with description as "White"
: Add it to the cart
: I change the quantity to "2" and click on update button
: Navigate to user details page and provide the following details

elements.name: Adding multiple item into the cart

steps.name: : I am at the home page
: I click on the "Headphones" search filter
: I select "JABRA" as the brand
: I select "Â£70 - Â£105" as the price filter
: I select the "JABRA Coach Headphones" with description as "Blue"
: Add it to the cart
: I click on the "Smart Devices" search filter
: I select "SAMSUNG" as the brand
: I select the "SAMSUNG Gear S2 Smartwatch" with description as "Black"
: Add it to the cart
: I change the quantity of item "SAMSUNG Gear S2 Smartwatch" to "3" and click on update button
: Navigate to user details page and provide the following details

name: Search with specific filter and add it to cart
